channel.title: News on M²LInES
channel.description: Recent content in News on M²LInES

item.title: KITP conference: Machine Learning for Climate
item.description: M²LInES Lead PI Laure Zanna is the co-director of the next conference on Machine Learning for Climate of the Kavli Institute for Theoretical Physics (KITP) . It will take place Nov 1-4 2021. Info and registration here

item.title: 2021 CESM workshop: M²LInES team members presenting on June 17th
item.description: M²LInES team members will present at Machine Learning session for the CESM workshop on June 17. Info and agenda here

item.title: Call for Papers for JAMES
item.description: M²LInES members Janni Yuval, Pierre Gentine and Laure Zanna are part of the organizers of a special collection at JAMES (Journal of Advances in Modeling Earth Systems) that will include both new ML methodologies developed for advancing Earth system science and ML applications to Earth system modeling. Papers submissions are open. The community is invited to contribute. More information here

item.title: M²LInES-related paper by PI Gentine
item.description: M²LInES PI Pierre Gentine is the senior author in this new publication. Research Scientist Tom Beucler is a co-author. Read their paper here

item.title: M²LInES-related paper by PI Gentine
item.description: M²LInES PI Pierre Gentine is the senior author and Research Scientist Tom Beucler is the lead author in this new publication. Read their paper here

item.title: New paper by M²LInES members Guillaumin and Zanna
item.description: In this paper, M²LInES postdoc Arthur Guillaumin and lead PI Laure Zanna developed a stochastic deep learning parametrization that is trained on high-resolution data from CM2.6, a coupled climate model. Read their paper here

item.title: M²LInES-related paper by PI Le Sommer
item.description: M²LInES PI Julien Le Sommer is a co-author in this new publication. Read their paper here
